ActorTalk: Grandpa Turtle from the library always says sincere wishes bring about miracles! Ribbit, and he was right!
If you ever find yourselves like Froggie, stuck in place, not sure which way to go, remember what I said, ribbit!
A message from Lucia... It's exactly the same as yesterday's. What's going on?
That dream again. But this time, it's even clearer.
